line_1: An' naething, now, to big a new ane,
line_2: Thy wee-bit housie, too, in ruin!

line_1: An' naething, now, to big a new ane,
line_2: It's silly wa's the win's are strewin!

line_1: An' naething, now, to big a new ane,
A heapet Stimpart, I'll reserve ane
line_2: An' think na, my auld, trusty Servan',

line_1: A heapet Stimpart, I'll reserve ane
line_2: That now perhaps thou's less deservin,

line_1: A heapet Stimpart, I'll reserve ane
line_2: An' thy auld days may end in starvin',

line_1: They hecht him some fine braw ane;
